channel.title: Comments on: הזמנה לתערוכת צילומים של… חברה שלי
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: 725176
item.description: I am not sure if Hebrew is working, so I'll do it in English: 1. Have a lot of happiness in the new journey in two. Mazal Tov. 2. We'll come to the exhibition, yet - not to the oppening - life is sometimes difficult.
item.content:encoded:
I am not sure if Hebrew is working, so I’ll do it in English:
1. Have a lot of happiness in the new journey in two. Mazal Tov.
2. We’ll come to the exhibition, yet – not to the oppening – life is sometimes difficult.
